About Me

BIO

After 10 years of professional experience as an industrial engineer I decided to complete one of my life goals and learn about software development so I entered a bootcamp in Japan and complete a Fullstack Engineer Track, I have build apps and websites using Javascript, React, Nodejs, Express and databases such as PostgresQL and MongoDB. So now IÂ´m professional with project and customer management experience that can work with software developers and develop my owns apps and websites and even learn new software languages by my own. Competencies: Project Management, Customer Service, Project Planning, Javascript, C#, HTML, CSS PERN and MERN Stack (Postgress/MongoDB, Express, React/React Native, Node JS), GIT, Redux, Heroku, TDD.

Project Manager

In charge of commercial and sales projects, leading a team to reach the projects goals from the desing phase to results delivery.

Sensata Technologies

In charge of a team of customer service representatives, to give tech support to customers, increase sales and enter new orders and introduce new customers.
